name: wrike-new-task
description: Create a Wrike task under a specified folder ID. [See the documentation](https://developers.wrike.com/api/v4/tasks/#create-task)

status.description: The status of task. Defaults to `Active`

importance.description: The importance of task. Defaults to `Normal`

responsibles.description: Makes specified users responsible for the task

name: wrike-update-task-custom-fields
description: Update the custom fields for a task. [See the documentation](https://developers.wrike.com/api/v4/tasks/#modify-tasks)

customFieldsValues.description: The custom field values, in the respective key order of selection, to set on the task
